attributes.additional_details:
1 in 3 children will have a Mental Illness which is directly linked to seeing Domestic Violence in their homes.
Educating young people on the issues,talking about it and getting them support and help if needed, would help to break the cycle of perpetrator and victim.
1.8 Million children are affected by Domestic Violence happening in their homes and is on the rise..
We at Free Your Mind feel that something more needs to be done.
Please sign this petition to encourage better educate children about Childhood Domestic Violence in schools.
It could change and better a young persons future.
www.freeyourmindcic.com

rejection.details: See 'Domestic Violence Prevention campaign in UK Schools'
